title: Rochelle is anxious believes everyone must approve

content.question: Rochelle is anxious because she believes that nearly everyone must approve of everything she does. Which of the following is a cognitive therapist most likely to do to help Rochelle overcome her anxiety?

choices.label: Reward her when she thinks positively about herself
Punish her when she thinks negatively about herself
Work on changing the way she interprets her circumstances
Find the subconscious source of her need for approval

content.answer: Work on changing the way she interprets her circumstances

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
